executable.title: Genus 0 Image Filter
executable.description: Adjusts a labelmap such that marching cubes will produce a genus zero surface.

parameters.label: Genus 0 Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the genus 0 image filter

boolean.name: cutLoops
boolean.label: Cut loops
boolean.description: Cut loops instead of patching holes.

boolean.name: biggestComponent
boolean.label: Biggest component
boolean.description: Extract largest component of the triangulated result. (The volume result needs to be followed by an extraction of the largest connected component if desired; use 'extractFinalConnectedComponent'.)

boolean.name: extractFinalConnectedComponent
boolean.label: Extract final connected component
boolean.description: Extracts the largest connected component after the processing. This is necessary, because the topology correction only guarantees the genus, but may otherwise produce a number of objects with spherical topology.

boolean.name: connectedComponent
boolean.label: Connected component
boolean.description: Extract largest connected component before processing.

boolean.name: computeSurface
boolean.label: Compute Surface
boolean.description: Compute VTK surface instead of corrected image volume.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Volume
image.description: Input volume to be topologically corrected

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Volume
image.description: Topologically corrected volume output (ignored if --computeSurface is set).

geometry.name: vtkOutput
geometry.label: vtk output file
geometry.description: File to write a VTK triangluated mesh to (ignored if --computeSurface is not set).

file.name: stlOutput
file.label: stl output file
file.description: File to write an STL triangluated mesh to.
